name: Turso
description: Interact with Turso-hosted LibSQL databases. List tables, inspect schemas, describe columns, and execute SELECT queries against your Turso database.

inputs.label: Turso Database URL
inputs.description: Turso database connection URL. Get it via 'turso db show --url <database>'.

obtain.instructions:
1. Go to Turso Dashboard
2. Select your database
3. Copy the database URL
4. Or run: turso db show --url <database-name>

inputs.label: Turso Auth Token
inputs.description: Authentication token for Turso database access. Generate via 'turso db tokens create <database>'.

auth.instructions: Generate a database token with 'turso db tokens create <database-name>' or from the Turso Dashboard.
